title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your boundaries are uncomfortably blurry today. Perhaps you cant tell if youre correctly perceiving something about a loved one or projecting your own feelings onto them. And the reverse could also prove true from others. Its possible that the motivations of someone seem mysterious to you, and youre still mystified even after they tell you the details. Perhaps youre both too distracted by your thoughts now to see whats really going on. In that case, step back until the clouds of confusion lift. Use your space wisely. Saint Augustine wrote, Patience is the companion of wisdom. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
